column1: Use first avilable date as default value
column2: Use first avilable date as default value

column1: Leave empty to use active locale format.
column2: Leave empty to use active locale format.

column1:
l, j F, Y - Sunday, 4 October, 2018
l - A full textual representation of the day of the week
j - Day of the month without leading zeros
F - A full textual representation of a month, such as January or March
Y - A full numeric representation of a year, 4 digits

m/d/Y - 10/04/2018
m - Numeric representation of a month, with leading zeros
d - Day of the month, 2 digits with leading zeros
Y - A full numeric representation of a year, 4 digits
column2:
l, j F, Y - Sunday, 4 October, 2018
l - A full textual representation of the day of the week
j - Day of the month without leading zeros
F - A full textual representation of a month, such as January or March
Y - A full numeric representation of a year, 4 digits

m/d/Y - 10/04/2018
m - Numeric representation of a month, with leading zeros
d - Day of the month, 2 digits with leading zeros
Y - A full numeric representation of a year, 4 digits

column1: Delivery will be available since first available day (order date) plus this value
column2: Delivery will be available since first available day (order date) plus this value

column1: Period in days, while delivery will be available, since first available day
column2: Period in days, while delivery will be available, since first available day

column1: Exclude days of week from delivery
column2: Exclude days of week from delivery
